name: Go with the Floe
description:
Go with the Floe is a Rhythm Heaven-inspired game about a mother polar bear and her cub traveling from the North Pole to the South Pole in search of a new home. Play rhythm minigames to collect food to survive and gorbage (yes, gorbage) to trade with a raccoon merchant for more food. Find other animal friends along the way and travel together to find refuge from pollution and global warming.

NOTE: Volume sliders in the options menu do not currently work properly. Please do not adjust them or the sounds will not play.
